oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Marc Beeson - 2017-03-18
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Marc Beeson from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 18, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Marc Beeson;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Program begins in progress with comments by Abi Tapia / (00:26) Introduction of Marc Beeson / (01:46) Marc's opening comments / (03:54) Home Town Girl / (08:34) We Are Tonight / (13:07) Answers question about writing songs for specific artists / (15:51) Answers question about music or lyrics coming first / (16:38) Answers question about writing solo or with co-writers / (18:40) Answers question about his favorite co-writers / (19:38) Answers question about if artists call him to co-write / (21:10) What I'm For / (28:22) When She Cries / (32:50) Answers question about what happened to the other member of the Burnin' Daylight band / (36:48) My Resume / (40:38) Closing comments by Marc Beeson / (40:39) Walk-out Music / (42:28) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Beeson, Marc; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
